content.rendered:
Roy, began his career with Clarion Advertising in Bangalore and within a year, was Account Group Head at Chrysalis Communications at Trivandrum. In 1994, he joined Stark as Director.

Roy has been the go-to man as far as Kerala Tourism is concerned; his strategy and operational brilliance has helped the brand grow from strength to strength. This brand-architect has upped the ante on how many brands speak, including Heera Homes, Malayala Manorama, Technopark, Manorama Online, etc.

A TAPMI Management Graduate, he believes in living curious and has completed an executive program at Sotheby’s London on the ‘Business Side of Art’. Roy loves art and music, perhaps in that order and can hold his own on the tennis court.
